page.title: 20A normal day as a 9-year-old
page.content:
In the mornings I wake up at 7.25 a.m. and it is a bit hard to get up. At breakfast I have tea and toast. I make it myself and I eat it with my brother and sister. School starts at 8.55 a.m. and I leave my home at 8.45 a.m. I wave to my Mum and Dad then go with my friends.
For lunch I have a school meal and I sit by my friends. I come home from school at 3.25 p.m. I go home alone or sometimes with my friends. When I get home I have a snack and watch television. I have a cooked tea at 5.30 p.m. In the evenings I go to Brownies and I watch television I go to bed at 9.30. p.m.
Lorraine Mort Thomas Wedge Junior School, Saughall.
